node.display_long_description:
Let’s dive in and explore the world of fishing or just sit back and relax in a mesmerizing scenery together.
Real VR Fishing invites you to the incredible real-world fishing spots to feel the taste of fishing in the Multiplayer mode or to relax and enjoy the stillness in the Single-play mode. 

MULTIPLAYER CO-OP AVAILABLE UP TO 4 USERS
Change your avatar, put on new clothes. Join friends, or meet new people to relax, talk, and go fishing together!

REALISTIC FISHING EXPERIENCE
Different difficulties for anglers and non-anglers. Turn off UI display for the most realistic experience when you are ready for a real challenge!

YOUTUBE & WEB-BROWSING
Need a break from fishing? Lie down and bring up the screen to relax and enjoy or turn up the volume and listen to the music while fishing!

YOUR AQUARIUM
Want to keep admiring the fish you have reeled in? Customize your aquarium by filling it with your catch, and purchase unique decorations from the shop!

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
*Increase in the stability of the game
*Fixed the autosave issue

nodes.title: Real VR Fishing Spring Edition is HERE!
nodes.body_text:
Spring Edition Update

*New Avatar Apparels
5th free major update is here for our fans! Initially adding 25 new avatar apparels (including shirts, gloves, hats, sunglasses). Get ready to show off your sense of fashion while fishing with friends from all around the globe. Or if you prefer, you can relax on boats, banks of rivers, and beaches enjoying the amazing graphics, ambient noise, and browsing the internet, or watching videos online! No matter if you are an introvert or an extrovert, we got you covered!

*New Leaderboard
Newly updated leaderboard where you can compete with others! Each species of fish has its own leaderboard now.

*New Home Menu
Updated home menu where you can find the news, register your coupons and receive mail.

Upcoming Weekly Event

Starting MAY you can earn amazing outfits just by playing the game at least once every week! Gain special outfits by relaxing on the water or meeting new people in-game! Plus, you can receive an extra special prize for attending every week of the month! 
*This feature will be coming in the month of MAY.

Put on your Oculus Quests and get ready to relax in the most relaxing place ever!

node.reviewDescription:
TLDR - Amazing game! I love it! Can we have something to sit on please?

I am a big fan of this game.  I won't repeat all the praise it deservedly receives except to say I love everything about it - except for one thing!

I am in my 60's with a dodgy knee. I can't stand for too long. I like games where you can play sitting down - which is one of the reasons I love Real VR Fishing. However, apart from a few of the boats, there is nowhere to sit!

It would be great if the next update included a stool or chair to sit on. When I'm on the kayak (for example), I put my real chair where the kayak seat is in-game and I can sit down comfortably. Some of the other boats have a bench or seat to sit on, and I move my chair around to match the position and adjust my height so it looks and feels  like I'm sitting on the seat - and if I get up for some reason, I can see in-game where to sit down again.

It would be great if (1) resetting the view would automatically put the player in the right place to sit down on the in-game bench or seat and (2) where there is no in-game seat (like on river banks or shores - or some boats), the player could select a stool or camp seat  which would appear under the headset as the player is sitting down.

Stools or chairs could be added as collectible items with a basic one at the start and fancier ones to earn or buy. It would give players something else to spend their cash on.

Please let me sit on something! Please!
node.reviewTitle: Love this game! But let me sit down  : )

developerResponse.body: Thank you michaeljones161 for playing Real VR Fishing and taking your time to leave such great comments. Regarding the "something to sit on", our team will discuss the feasibility for future updates. We will continue to listen and deliver the best possible experience. Thank you for your support and happy fishing!
